channel.title: "Java.net.UnknownHostException:" Help
channel.description:
Why does my server do this: [code]java.net.UnknownHostException: bananascapepk.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:32) at Gui.main(Gui.java:26) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Even Though I portforward and static ip and do all that other stuff it usually says??? And it does this with the localhost too? It's a PI, 317.

item.title: "Java.net.UnknownHostException:" Help
item.dc:creator: @bananastreet bananastreet
item.description:
@bananastreet wrote:

Why does my server do this:

java.net.UnknownHostException: bananascapepk.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:32) at Gui.main(Gui.java:26) Press any key to continue . . .

Even Though I portforward and static ip and do all that other stuff it usually says???
And it does this with the localhost too?
Itâ€™s a PI, 317.
